nodes.text: Fostin Nine was a moon located in the Outer Rim.
During the Republic Dark Age, the mercenary Beld Yulan lost his children to a plague on the moon, which caused him to be overcome by depression and later join an Odionite death cult.
A millennia later, during the Clone Wars, Jedi General Etain Tur-Mukan ordered Omega Squad to perform a reconnaissance there.
